column2: "Oh, <%me>, welcome back. You always seem to be working hard."
"I heard that a new area was discovered on the Planet Wopal."
"How is it? It always makes me happy to hear your experiences."
"A mysterious facility on the bottom of the ocean? I wonder what it was for?"
"I wonder if it was for excavating resources like the Lillipa mine?"
"Oh, sorry, I got a little carried away talking."
"Wonder if it causes trouble for you telling all of this information to someone who isn't in ARKS."
"Sometimes I wonder, but if there's no problems, then I guess it's okay."
"But I wonder if you might get targeted by that rumored death squad."
"1. Don't worry about it"
"2. Do you want to be targeted?"
"It could be a possibility. Maybe... I think..."
"How are you able to deny the possibility so lightly?"
"It seems almost like you know someone inside."
"If you say so, then it might really be a possibility."
"No, not at all!"
"I was just curious to meet what someone from the squad is like...."
"I want to ask them why they would join the squad and see what they are like."
"...So, it's not like I want to be targeted or anything, okay?"
